text: 8.7: 1 Ko 1.5; 12.13; 16.1-2; 2 Ko 9.8Nde za mba bigi ga mbuav, nde tɨvir vhuuiŋra zɨn vuav nta mbui. Nde guigi guarira Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgap, nde khaŋ tɨga havhargiap ana khothɨgi tɨv, nde thukhɨngira ana bun nzuai. Nde vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme tɨvi gu ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrve kaŋgiap, nde vhɨra guigira Fhe Bakɨmen ŋaarar muungeŋ vuzvugi. Nde maaŋ mbuav, nde guigira wari won ndavir nza nɨɨŋgi. Nde nzerara maaŋ mbui, nde mba tɨvara, nde ntigem Fhe Bakɨme nde kora mbui ŋaar, nde khaŋ tɨgɨp vhɨra mba ŋaarar muuŋv nde vhɨra khaŋ tɨgɨp harigi ntɨɨrir kurkurigi ŋaarar muuŋri.
